body.p: This week's issue of the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter brings news about getting the latest version of gcc to work correctly with your Gentoo Linux box. Additionally, we have information about the next release of Gentoo Linux 1.4, including a freeze to the Portage tree as 1.4_final/rc3 moves into the next stage in the formal release process discussed last week. Plus, we continue to bring you the latest Bugzilla, Portage Watch and Gentoo Security updates as well.
